question.body: Which plexus is responsible for the spontaneous movement of the GI tract?

response.feedback: Incorrect. The submucosal plexus is in the submucosal layer and regulates digestive secretions.
Incorrect. The plexus of meissner is in the submucosal layer and regulates digestive secretions.
Correct. The myenteric plexus also called the Auerbach plexus and is responsible for the movement of the GI tract.
Incorrect. The cervical plexus serves the head, neck and shoulder regions
